+- document[@XmlEncoding = null, @XmlStandalone = false, @XmlVersion = "1.0"]
   +- comment[]
   +- rootElement[]
   +- rootElement[]
      +- text[@Text = "\n    "]
      +- comment[]
      +- text[@Text = "\n    "]
      +- child1[@test = "1"]
      |  +- text[@Text = "entity: Copyright: PMD\n    "]
      +- text[@Text = "\n    "]
      +- child2[]
      |  +- text[@Text = "\n        "]
      |  +- cdata-section[@Text = " cdata section "]
      |  +- text[@Text = "\n    "]
      +- text[@Text = "\n"]
